title: Finding the X- and Y- Intercepts
text: $$x-y=-3$$. The x-intercept can be calculated by the equation $$x=-3$$, and the y-intercept can be calculated by the equation $$-y=-3$$. Solving these equations, we get the x-intercept as $$-3$$ and the y-intercept as $$3$$. $$-3+3=0$$
